urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community
urls.description: Discover unique and original NFT Planie artwork created by airBaltic. Buy, sell and trade special cartoon aircraft design collection of 10 000 digital collectibles stored on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain and enjoy travel benefits as part of airBaltic Club loyalty program.

data.text: The wait is over @PlaniesNFT have taken off and landed in airBaltic club! ✈️ Stake your Planie and receive 20 points per day by simply owning a Planie 💰 Spend points on payments for flights, vouchers, gift cards, reward flights and more! Join the family: https://t.co/sJsm9voxcj https://t.co/NIfB66zs5A
@gi_ginc @Lidosta_Riga Tikai trenējamies! 😎

Thank you.

urls.title: Check in for flight - Online Check-in | airBaltic
urls.description: Find information about numerous ways to check in for airBaltic flights, and get information about check-in deadlines, fees and other special conditions.

data.text:
@LasseKaila Please be informed that online check-in is free of charge. However - check-in at the airport costs a fee of 35EUR. More details: https://t.co/LR6Z6zYojj
Thank you.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text:
@LasseKaila Hello! We regret to hear of such experience. We kindly inform that online check-in is not mandatory, however - it is free of charge. We invite you to fill out our claim form:  https://t.co/N04NoYVrbN
Our colleagues will investigate the matter in regards to the technical issues.

urls.title: airBaltic carries over 400 tonnes of mail from Ukraine
urls.description: airBaltic has already carried a total weight of over 400 tonnes of mail from Ukraine to various destinations.

data.text: Since April we have been providing cargo operations from Kyiv, Ukraine by organising a multimodal mail transportation system in cooperation with Ukrposhta. Until September our cooperation has already carried over 400 tonnes of mail to various destinations: https://t.co/YFLJ4sP64b https://t.co/dbrIvvFhC6

We kindly ask you to submit us more details about what's happened:
https://t.co/N04NoYVrbN
Our Customer Relations department will review and investigate this case.
@NecromanDisqo Hello! The offer is still valid and working! 🙂 We kindly invite you to visit the link for more details! Thank you.
@madleo14 💚💚💚

urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community
urls.description: Discover unique and original NFT Planie artwork created by airBaltic. Buy, sell and trade special cartoon aircraft design collection of 10 000 digital collectibles stored on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain and enjoy travel benefits as part of airBaltic Club loyalty program.

data.text: Attention to detail is impeccable @PlaniesNFT! 🔍 Even with over 180 traits available, each Planie feels like it was handcrafted ✈️ Whether it be the sparkle in their eyes or the upcoming airBaltic club benefits, we can't take our eyes off it 🤩 Read more: https://t.co/sJsm9vnZmL https://t.co/ayR9LSKEQQ
@Olafsss ✔️

urls.title: 40 € off CLASSIC tickets | airBaltic
urls.description: Book the flexible CLASSIC tickets and save 20 € per one-way flight or 40 € round trip. You can use the discount for flights to any airBaltic destination.

data.text: Until the 27th of October, use the opportunity to be flexible and choose CLASSIC tickets! 🎩 Save 20 € per one-way flight or 40 € round trip and get all the essentials included in the price: checked baggage, seat selection, airport check-in and more: https://t.co/DJXvAF9UXK https://t.co/BcLOoe3k11
@TavaJakaTava Labdien! Jā, bez problēmām! :)

Did you know that October is our birthday month? 🎂 From just an average of 190 flights a month in 1995 to 3420 flights in September 2022, we have become the number one carrier in the Baltics by proudly performing more than 841 000 flights during these 27 years ✈️ https://t.co/2BDwAtB2Nz
@KristianPurvin @PlaniesNFT Lielisks lēmums! 😍
@MDoc196 @PlaniesNFT We recognise a rare Planie when we see one 🤩 It might take you to the moon and back, who knows 👀

urls.title: Visbiežāk uzdotie jautājumi - sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Meklē atbildes uz interesējošiem jautājumiem un atrodi noderīgus kontaktus, lai varētu ar mums sazināties neskaidrību gadījumā. Mēs ar prieku palīdzēsim!

data.text: @Baumerts Paldies par jautājumu! Lūdzam sazināties ar Zvanu Centra aģentiem, kas visātrāk spēs atrisināt šo problēmu: https://t.co/jqOp3nTKli
@Kris_likes_Pho @PlaniesNFT So full of love, a true sweetheart 🥰

data.text: Three eventful days at the Istanbul airshow where we put on our sunglasses to face the sun and showcase our @Airbus A220-300 in the best light possible ✈️ Thank you to all customers, international media and aviation professionals who visited our aircraft! https://t.co/xOLjNV4Zyb

urls.title: Izteikt pretenziju | Sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Gadījās kaut ko aizmirst lidmašīnā? Bagāžas piegāde kavējās? Piesaki pretenziju airBaltic par bagāžas pārvadāšanu, reisa izmaiņām un daudz ko citu internetā!

data.text:
@IevaAncane Labdien! Atvainojamies par šo nepatīkamo "pārsteigumu", tādus noteikti pasažieriem nevēlamies.
Pieļaujam, ka kāda sistēmas kļūme, vai kāds cits iemesls, tāpēc, ja par vietu maksāts un tā netika iegūta - lūdzam aizpildīt šo formu: https://t.co/Y5ZBQMLaej
@LuBrooo @PlaniesNFT Well that's some impressive collection! 😯
@VB_Viki13 @PlaniesNFT Be cautious with that porcelain flying around! 😍
@Aigarus @PlaniesNFT Well, perfect for the upcoming season! 🎅
@artauma @PlaniesNFT Those are the only tears we are happy for! 🥹
@EdzuksB @PlaniesNFT Riga background and a full porcelain one, wow! 💚
@xbitz1337 @PlaniesNFT They’re cousins! 💚

Few days ago our @PlaniesNFT holders were able to see the beautiful and unique digital collectibles they minted! ✈️ It was truly exciting to check which traits out of the 180 each of them got. If you're a part of this adventure, share your #Planie and let's see the traits! 😍 https://t.co/bTR2Bzlvzm

Till 17th October choose your favourite seat with a 25% discount! Head to the section "My booking" and select the best seat! Whether it is a window seat or the aisle, you choose ✈️💺 https://t.co/EsWE0kDtIj

data.text: @KLumane Labvakar! Pirmkārt, vēlamies atvainoties par lidojuma kavēšanos un nepatīkamo pieredzi. Lūdzam aizpildīt šo formu, lai Klientu Attiecību kolēģi var šīs situācijas izskatīt sīkāk un sniegt atbildi: https://t.co/Y5ZBQMLaej
@NoorAlAli Yes, we just messaged you back!
@JanisLibeks Šis jautājums Jums būs jāadresē tieši šai aviokompānijai, nevarēsim sniegt komentāru, kāpēc cita aviokompānija Jūs lidojumam nevarēja reģistrēt.

urls.title: airBaltic Introduces Loyalty Points Payment Option
urls.description: This option will allow the members of the Club to use their collected loyalty points for ticket purchase at airBaltic.com.

data.text: Good news for our dedicated airBaltic club members! 💚 We have introduced a new payment option by using your airBaltic club points! Now you’ll be able to use your collected points to either fully pay for the ticket or combine it with other payment types: https://t.co/azqMw4nA9L https://t.co/eyAgyZYonR

Proud @PlaniesNFT holders, gather around! ✈️ Today is the day you'll finally see which one of the beautiful 10 000 digital collectibles you minted 🌍 Check out the hangar & see which #PlaniesNFT made it to you!

urls.title: airBaltic Carries 45% More Passengers in September
urls.description: In September 2022, airBaltic performed 3 420 flights – by 15% more than in September 2021.

data.text: During the first month of autumn, September, we have carried 338 100 passengers in around 3 420 flights! ✈️ That's 45% more than during the same period last year: https://t.co/RHh827VNkd 🌍 https://t.co/IikTpvRLDz

urls.title: Šodien ielido un izlido - Jaunākā lidojumu informācija
urls.description: Vienalga vai Jūs lido pats, vai arī plāno sagaidīt kādu personu lidostā, šeit atradīsi jaunāko informāciju par airBaltic lidojumiem, lai efektīvāk varētu saplānot savu laiku.

data.text: Informējam, ka skrejceļa gaismu sistēmas tehnisku traucējumu dēļ airBaltic lidojumu grafikā uz/no Rīgas lidostas šodien iespējamas izmaiņas. Lūdzam sekot līdzi informācijai par lidojumiem šeit: https://t.co/YkMzCDoJfs https://t.co/VbiJS9YznC

urls.title: Flight status | Live flight information | airBaltic
urls.description: Whether you are flying, or need to pick up a loved one or colleague at the airport, you can find the latest scheduled times in order to plan your day most efficiently!

data.text: Due to technical malfunctions of the runway lighting system, schedule disruptions may occur at Riga Airport for airBaltic flights today. Follow the link for your flight status: https://t.co/4OhJpoXM6a https://t.co/SG43lkbcqJ
@arturszeps Nekas! Treniņi. 🤓
@birzniecepaula 😇 Lai saulaina nedēļas nogale!
@birzniecepaula Jā, jo daļa no piedāvātajiem ir codeshare reisi sadarbībā ar mūsu partneraviokompāniju LOT Polish Airlines, kas joprojām veic tiešos lidojumus šajā maršrutā: https://t.co/GmosA7NU9N
@imantso 😍😍😍

@mooneshe @Dimizzzz @birzniecepaula Labrīt! Kā jau daudzi šeit atzīmējuši, šobrīd tiešos lidojumus uz/no Varšavas veikt neplānojam, kas ietekmē arī piedāvāto lidojumu cenas, jo tie ir pieejami tikai ar savienojumu un mūsu partneraviokompānijām. Taču, pārbaudīsim mazā kalendāra skatu, kurā uzrādās šādas cenas.

data.text: Greetings from Istanbul Airshow 2022! 👋 We are excited to share our experience with @Airbus A220-300 aircraft to customers, international media and public. Starting from April 2023, airBaltic will carry its passengers to and from Istanbul as a part of the 2023 schedule. https://t.co/86cwOohxzY
@verschnupferich Hello! May we ask you to DM us more details about the particular claim - case number as well as baggage irregularity reference. We will check the status.

data.text: We're happy to join @Airbus at another amazing airshow! This time we're visiting Istanbul Airshow 2022 to showcase the state-of-the-art Airbus A220-300 aircraft 💚✈️ https://t.co/dRGFNOB00M

urls.title: Baltic Outlook magazine | airBaltic
urls.description: Be they adventurous backpackers or sophisticated voyagers, the monthly Baltic Outlook magazine is an excellent resource for any kind of travellers.

data.text:
October issue of Baltic Outlook is out! ✈️ This month the highlight is Paris - with its elegant combination of the ancient world and the intellectual and cultural edginess, the city makes a travel experience truly come alive 🇫🇷
💚 Read more: https://t.co/GBno8KFKJm https://t.co/8zKrneKEXl
@Jukka_91 In such case we kindly invite you to contact the Lost and Found office at your final destination. Thank you.

@Jukka_91 Hello, Jukka! Thanks for reaching out to us. We regret to hear of such negative experience. In this particular case we kindly invite you to contact the Lost and Found office at the arrival hall. Our colleagues will assist you in locating the stroller. Thank you.

data.text: Hello from Amsterdam and World Aviation Festival 2022!👋We are excited to connect with industry professionals on-site and step on stage for a keynote interview about airBaltic experience pioneering the field of NFT in aviation with @PlaniesNFT collection #AviationFest https://t.co/GLGTXL9jIA

urls.title: Planies NFT Club: The first Web3 travel community
urls.description: Discover unique and original NFT Planie artwork created by airBaltic. Buy, sell and trade special cartoon aircraft design collection of 10 000 digital collectibles stored on the Ethereum (ETH) blockchain and enjoy travel benefits as part of airBaltic Club loyalty program.

data.text:
Our @PlaniesNFT have taken off ✈️ To enhance our airBaltic Club loyalty programme, we have released #Planies - 10 000 digital collectibles!
🎫 Planies holders will receive 20 airBaltic Club points per day and redeem them for flights and other benefits.
👉 https://t.co/IcOw7xV9fa https://t.co/iupciQmUas
@clarencewalk If you do not have booked or chosen an assigned seat - correct!

@clarencewalk We ask for such information only if it is needed for your route.
If needed, you will be able to enter passport details etc. during the online check-in. If not needed - we will not ask for such information.
@clarencewalk Hello! May we ask you to clarify your question as why would you like to input these details? You may also DM us with more private information about the booking if needed.
@Elza_K_ By the information available to us, this flight was delayed due to operational reasons - aircraft arriving late from its previous destination.

urls.title: Submit a claim | Contact us | airBaltic
urls.description: Left your belongings on the plane? Was your baggage delayed? You can submit a claim about baggage, flight irregularities and more to airBaltic online.

data.text:
@Elza_K_ Hello! We’re very sorry about this situation. Sadly, we won’t be able to comment without knowing the exact flight. However we can suggest filling out the claim form, our colleagues will be able to provide detailed information: https://t.co/N04NoZd2An

Apologies once again!

data.text:
📣 Our @PlaniesNFT are taking off tomorrow for our allowlist ✈️ Today until 13:00 CET join the allowlist to mint your airBaltic #PlaniesNFT first! After the reveal connect it to your airBaltic Club account, collect points for free flights and more🤩
👉Join https://t.co/IcOw7xV9fa https://t.co/DLtksq6Fo8

@jakobrosin Hello! Thank you for the question! We kindly inform you that if not able to register for the flight online, passengers with special service or medical assistance requested may register for the flight at the airport free of charge.

On October 1, 1995, we operated our first ever commercial flight from Riga to Stockholm with an aircraft that had just 33 seats. Now, 27 years, 50 million passengers and 2000 employees later, we're incredibly grateful to connect Baltics to the world! ✈️ https://t.co/DMTFvA4fxh

urls.title: airBaltic CEO Update | Summer 2022
Izteikt pretenziju | Sazinies ar mums | airBaltic
urls.description: Gadījās kaut ko aizmirst lidmašīnā? Bagāžas piegāde kavējās? Piesaki pretenziju airBaltic par bagāžas pārvadāšanu, reisa izmaiņām un daudz ko citu internetā!

data.text:
@Janis_Veide Labdien!
Lūdzam izmantot šo formu šādas izziņas saņemšanai: https://t.co/Y5ZBQN2LCT
@artis_bangieris @Talis_L Vēlamies noskaidrot papildus detaļas, lai sīkāk izmeklētu šo situāciju. Diemžēl Twitterī Jums šobrīd privāto ziņu nosūtīt nevaram, tā būs jāinicē no Jūsu puses. Paldies.
@artis_bangieris @Talis_L Vai varam lūgt mums atsūtīt privāto ziņu? Paldies!

@artis_bangieris @Talis_L Informējam, ka airBaltic piedāvā 7 valodas iespējas mūsu mājaslapā, tostarp latviešu, angļu, vācu, igauņu, lietuviešu un arī somu.
Attiecībā uz Jūsu minēto piemēru, sūdzības no citiem pasažieriem par rēķiniem nepareizās valodās neesam saņēmuši, taču izmeklēsim konkrēto situāciju.

urls.title: Largest number of new routes – airBaltic announces 18 new routes
urls.description: The Latvian airline airBaltic has today published its flight schedule for the upcoming summer season next year, which will begin at the end of March 2023.

data.text: Great news for airBaltic club members! We have started a new loyalty program cooperation with @KLM and @airfrance. This partnership will offer the club members earn and spend loyalty points on codeshare flights operated by KLM or Air France: https://t.co/L5CRML4M0r https://t.co/BFFl9RWHBF
@naurisk_ Labdien! Viļņas lidostas apkārtnē šorīt ir bieza migla, kas, diemžēl, ietekmē arī mūsu darbību.

@artis_bangieris @Talis_L Labdien! Informējam, ka apstiprinājuma e-pasts (+ rēķins) tiek sūtīts tādā valodā, kāda tika izvēlēta biļetes iegādes brīdī mūsu mājaslapā.

Tas nozīmē, ka konkrētais pasažieris bija izvēlējies tieši šo valodu, lai lietotu mūsu mājaslapu.
Have you packed a bag for your next trip? Maybe this offer will inspire you to pack more - until Monday you can add checked baggage with a 20% discount 🧳️ https://t.co/Lfqk8uMUfx
